mapper.sql: f_id, f_work_id, f_surface_id, f_processing_method_id, f_process_content, f_sort, f_is_delete, f_creator_id, f_createtime, f_updater_id, f_updatetime
mapper.select:
select
from t_craft_card where f_is_delete = 0 and f_work_id = #{workId}

select a.f_id as 'id', a.f_surface_id as 'surfaceId', b.f_name as 'surfaceName', a.f_processing_method_id as 'processingMethodId', c.f_name as 'processingMethodName', a.f_process_content as 'processContent', a.f_sort as 'sort' from t_craft_card a left join t_surface b on a.f_surface_id = b.f_id left join t_processing_method c on a.f_processing_method_id = c.f_id where a.f_is_delete = 0 and b.f_is_delete = 0 and c.f_is_delete = 0 and a.f_work_id = #{workId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_craft_card (f_id, f_work_id, f_surface_id, f_processing_method_id, f_process_content, f_sort, f_is_delete, f_creator_id, f_createtime, f_updater_id, f_updatetime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{surfaceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{processingMethodId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{processContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

f_work_id = #{workId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
